statements: SELECT * FROM customer_lifetime_value_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE last_purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, last_purchase_date FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_lifetime_value_data ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount, last_purchase_date FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC, last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE total_purchase_amount < 5000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_lifetime_value_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.email_subject, c.customer_name FROM email_marketing e JOIN customers c ON e.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, e.email_subject, e.send_date FROM customers c JOIN email_marketing e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id WHERE e.send_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY e.send_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(e.email_id) AS total_emails_sent FROM customers c LEFT JOIN email_marketing e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_emails_sent > 5 ORDER BY total_emails_sent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'discount';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, join_date FROM customers WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-08-01' AND end_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, transactions.transaction_date, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN products ON transactions.order_id = products.product_id ORDER BY customers.customer_name, transactions.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count >= 3;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.product_name, t.quantity FROM customers c INNER JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id INNER JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
